address: Phường Liên Bảo, Thành phố Vĩnh Yên, Tỉnh Vĩnh Phúc
thought:
**Navigating the Administrative Restructuring of Vĩnh Phúc**

Okay, so I've got an old address to sort out: "Phường Liên Bảo, Thành phố Vĩnh Yên, Tỉnh Vĩnh Phúc."  My task is to pinpoint the new administrative unit(s) for this location.  First, I break it down: "Phường Liên Bảo" (ward), "Thành phố Vĩnh Yên" (city), and "Tỉnh Vĩnh Phúc" (province).

The key here is understanding the changes brought about by the province mergers.  Resolution 60-NQ/TW tells me that "Tỉnh Vĩnh Phúc" has been merged into "Tỉnh Phú Thọ".  So, right away, I know the new province will be Phú Thọ.

Now, I need to dig into the details of what happened to the specific ward, "Phường Liên Bảo."  I start by scanning the relevant resolutions for any mentions of "Liên Bảo" or "Vĩnh Yên."  Resolutions about other provinces are immediately discarded; they're not relevant.

My focus lands on Resolution 1676/NQ-UBTVQH15, which specifically deals with the restructuring of units within Phú Thọ.  Bingo!  Line 139 of this resolution clarifies everything. It states that "Phường Liên Bảo," along with other wards, has been merged to create a *new* ward called "**phường Vĩnh Phúc**." This directly impacts our original address.

Additionally, line 140 of the resolution states that "phường Vĩnh Yên" is also a new ward created from a combination of other existing wards.  However, since our original address contained the name "Phường Liên Bảo", which has been merged into "phường Vĩnh Phúc", this is what I'll focus on.

Therefore, my conclusion is that the new address will be "Phường Vĩnh Phúc, Thành phố Vĩnh Yên, Tỉnh Phú Thọ." I believe this is accurate based on my analysis of the available restructuring data.

citation.header: 60-NQ/TW: Các đơn vị hành chính cấp tỉnh mới sau sáp nhập, hợp nhất
citation.line: 4. Hợp nhất tỉnh Vĩnh Phúc, tỉnh Phú Thọ và tỉnh Hoà Bình; lấy tên là tỉnh Phú Thọ
